title: Top selling Nintendo Wii games worldwide in 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million units for 10 number of Months.
The Sales in million units is highest at Month Wii Sports and lowest at Month Wii Party.
The maximum Month Wii Sports has got 8.87 times higher Sales in million units than the minimum Month Wii Party.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Sales in million units in the y axis.
Month Wii Sports has the highest Sales in million units and Wii Party has the lowest Sales in million units.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million units for 10 number of Months.
The Sales in million units is highest at Month Wii Sports and lowest at Month Wii Party.
The maximum Month Wii Sports has got 8.87 times higher Sales in million units than the minimum Month Wii Party.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Sales in million units in the y axis.
Month Wii Sports has the highest Sales in million units and Wii Party has the lowest Sales in million units.
The difference of Sales in million units between the highest and lowest Month is 73.54.
Sales in million units at Month Wii Sports is 82.88 , second place is Mario Kart Wii at 37.24, and thirdly is Wii Sports Resort at 33.11.
Over the past 10 Months, the Sales in million units has reduced.
The Month Wii Party tends to be 2.85 percent lower than average.
